column2: What is the highest degree or level of school you have completed?
column4: Would do you describe yourself as a man, as a woman or in any other way?
column5: Are you a native English speaker?
column6: Please, rate your written English skills on a scale from 1 ("I barely understand it") to 5 ("I perfectly understand it")
column7:
Please consider the following metaphorical sentence/s

    DIPLOMACY IS WAR

In order to understand the metaphor, it is necessary somehow to creatively combine the meaning of the concepts diplomacy and war, creating a new metaphorical concept diplomacy-war.
Please rate on a scale between 1 (worst) and 10 (best) if, overall, the following features associated to the new metaphorical concept make sense to understand its metaphorical meaning.

    conflict: 0.888
    bad thing: 0.88
    fight: 0.865
    negotiation: 0.865
    fighting between countries: 0.859
    battle: 0.858
    not peace: 0.853
    bridge differences: 0.853
